QuestData.Title: The Drums of War
QuestData.Description: Whatever the Grimtotem are doing with these Drums of War, we don't want them to have them.$B$BDon't worry, $n, we'll figure it all out. But first, we need to gather all of the pieces of the puzzle.
QuestData.CompletionText: The tauren love their drums. I can only imagine the Drums of War will be somehow different from the others.
QuestData.RewardText: Surely that was the voice of the Elder Crone!$B$BWe must be very careful, $n. Great danger lies ahead if Magatha Grimtotem has taken notice of you.
